name: Space Panic Defense
description: A futuristic tower defense game with action and strategy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP4 or later Processor: Intel i3 2.6Ghz or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or later Processor: Intel i5 2.6Ghz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1500 MB available space
